PARAM.name: Comments
PARAM.value: trecs_fArIII.dat Transmission curve for T-ReCS ArIII+PAH1_ref2 8.99um filter No blocking element needed. Measurement temperature = 10K Author: James De Buizer, digitized from info from U. Reading Created: 2003 Apr 9

PARAM.name: WavelengthMean
PARAM.DESCRIPTION: Mean wavelength. Defined as integ[x*filter(x) dx]/integ[filter(x) dx]

PARAM.name: WavelengthEff
PARAM.DESCRIPTION: Effective wavelength. Defined as integ[x*filter(x)*vega(x) dx]/integ[filter(x)*vega(x) dx]

PARAM.name: WavelengthMin
PARAM.DESCRIPTION: Minimum filter wavelength. Defined as the first lambda value with a transmission at least 1% of maximum transmission

PARAM.name: WavelengthMax
PARAM.DESCRIPTION: Maximum filter wavelength. Defined as the last lambda value with a transmission at least 1% of maximum transmission

PARAM.name: WidthEff
PARAM.DESCRIPTION: Effective width. Defined as integ[x*filter(x) dx].\nEquivalent to the horizontal size of a rectangle with height equal to maximum transmission and with the same area that the one covered by the filter transmission curve.

PARAM.name: WavelengthCen
PARAM.DESCRIPTION: Central wavelength. Defined as the central wavelength between the two points defining FWMH

PARAM.name: WavelengthPivot
PARAM.DESCRIPTION: Peak wavelength. Defined as sqrt{integ[x*filter(x) dx]/integ[filter(x) dx/x]}

PARAM.name: WavelengthPeak
PARAM.DESCRIPTION: Peak wavelength. Defined as the lambda value with larger transmission

PARAM.name: WavelengthPhot
PARAM.DESCRIPTION: Photon distribution based effective wavelength. Defined as integ[x^2*filter(x)*vega(x) dx]/integ[x*filter(x)*vega(x) dx]

PARAM.name: FWHM
PARAM.DESCRIPTION: Full width at half maximum. Defined as the difference between the two wavelengths for which filter transmission is half maximum
